name: Pushpender Singh Kumar

Proficient in state management (BLoC, Riverpod, GetX), Firebase services, and game development with the Flame game engine. Adept at API integration, real-time data handling, and crafting responsive, scalable UIs. Contributor to open-source projects with a passion for clean, maintainable code.

projects.title: Movie and Event Booking App
projects.description: Worked on a cross-platform mobile application that allows users to browse, book, and pay for movies and events. Integrated real-time data updates and secure payment processing using mollie payment gateway. The admin dashboard (built with Angular) enables event management, booking analytics, and user administration.

projects.title: Crypto Exchange App

projects.description: Worked on a cross-platform application to monitor, log, and analyze battery health and performance metrics on using microcontroller devices to fetch battery data. Focused on real-time data visualization and system optimization alerts.

Developed using Flutter for the frontend and Node.js for the backend API. the backend includes role-based access control and real-time notifications for HR and management teams.
